message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.OS, cs.SY, cs.Distributed Systems. 

The paper discusses the deployment of RDMA in datacenters, which is related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and network infrastructure (cs.NI). The focus on low CPU overhead and high throughput suggests operating systems (cs.OS) as another likely category. The use of RDMA in cloud computing platforms also suggests a systems perspective (cs.SY). Finally, the emphasis on scalability and service-oriented architecture suggests distributed systems (cs.Distributed Systems) as a possible category.
